ConnectionFactory - Class in dataAccessLayer
Class that establishes the connection between the app and the local database.

The constructor is private since an instance of this class is only created once and in this class (the singleInstance private static variable).

Logs in the local database and returns; it is used by the getConnection method.

createOrder(String, String, int, String) - Method in class businessLayer.OrderBLL
Adds a new order to the orders table with the data got from: the clients table (for client_id), the products table (for product_id) - according to the names given as parameters -, the parameters (for quantity).
